segments.text: Hi , I'm calling about the ad in the paper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good , which job is that ? We advertised several openings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! It was for a market sale manager . Is that still available ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . But we'll be making a decision on it pretty soon . Why don't you come in and fill out an application ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What company is this for ? I mean where's the opening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can discuss that when you come in and fill out the application .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm already in this field and know most of the companies . Before I come in to fill out an application , I need to know who it's with so I know whether or not I'm willing to work with them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid I can't discuss that over the phone .
segments.speaker: S2
